original_title: Bread: Peter Schumann and Sourdough Rye
overview: This documentary by Susan Bettmann dives deep into the mixing trough, following Bread and Puppet Theater director Peter Schumann from grinding rye grain to baking in wood-fired ovens to feeding the appreciative crowds that come to enjoy the Bread and Puppet Theater experience.
title: Bread: Peter Schumann and Sourdough Rye
